description: React functional component for Jira integration panel, handling OAuth and API token authentication, project fetching and UI interaction.

methods.name: handleOAuthConnect
methods.description: Initiates OAuth connection flow by redirecting user to Atlassian's OAuth URL and managing loading/error states.

methods.name: handleTokenAuth
methods.description: Handles API token authentication by sending user credentials to backend, managing connection state, errors, and fetching projects upon success.

methods.name: fetchProjects
methods.description: Fetches list of Jira projects from backend API and updates component state.

methods.name: handleInputChange
methods.description: Updates form data state on user input changes.

methods.name: handleDisconnect
methods.description: Resets connection state and form data, effectively disconnecting from Jira.
